title: Times have changed
creator_credit: Lillian Murray, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Lillian Murray has worked in the offices of Legacy in Melbourne’s CBD for the last 29 years. It is her home away from home and she reflects on the technological changes there as well as the good times and the great people she has the pleasure to work with.
